content:
IOutputSessionChannel Interface

Definition

Defines the interface that associates an output channel with a session.

In this Article

public interface IOutputSessionChannel : System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel<System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>

Remarks

The IOutputSessionChannel interface indicates that an IOutputChannel implements IOutputSession semantics.

The IOutputSession associated with an IOutputSessionChannel can be retrieved through the Session property.
